Posts.Content: Jun 29, 2011 01:35AM covelman wrote: hi -  I'm new to breastcancer.org. I have stage IIA with sentinal node, had a lumpectomy and had my first chemo two weeks ago. My next chemo is a week from now, I have 2 more after that and then 6 weeks radiation. I'm ok with what I'm facing but am a little bummed tonight as my hair has been coming out like crazy for 4 days now :( I thought I could handle the hair but..... :( :( :(
